movies.title: Beetlejuice
movies.actors: Alec Baldwin, Geena Davis, Annie McEnroe, Maurice Page
movies.plot: A couple of recently deceased ghosts contract the services of a "bio-exorcist" in order to remove the obnoxious new owners of their house.

movies.title: The Cotton Club
movies.actors: Richard Gere, Gregory Hines, Diane Lane, Lonette McKee
movies.plot: The Cotton Club was a famous night club in Harlem. The story follows the people that visited the club, those that ran it, and is peppered with the Jazz music that made it so famous.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Crocodile Dundee
movies.actors: Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon, David Gulpilil
movies.plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

movies.title: Valkyrie
movies.actors: Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy, Tom Wilkinson
movies.plot: A dramatization of the 20 July assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Hitler during World War II.

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.actors: Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy
movies.plot: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

movies.title: City of God
movies.actors: Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Phellipe Haagensen, Douglas Silva
movies.plot: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

movies.title: Memento
movies.actors: Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano, Mark Boone Junior
movies.plot: A man juggles searching for his wife's murderer and keeping his short-term memory loss from being an obstacle.

movies.title: The Intouchables
movies.actors: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
movies.plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

movies.title: Stardust
movies.actors: Ian McKellen, Bimbo Hart, Alastair MacIntosh, David Kelly
movies.plot: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

movies.title: Apocalypto
movies.actors: Rudy Youngblood, Dalia Hernández, Jonathan Brewer, Morris Birdyellowhead
movies.plot: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, the rulers insist the key to prosperity is to build more temples and offer human sacrifices. Jaguar Paw, a young man captured for sacrifice, flees to avoid his fate.

movies.title: Taxi Driver
movies.actors: Diahnne Abbott, Frank Adu, Victor Argo, Gino Ardito
movies.plot: A mentally unstable Vietnam War veteran works as a night-time taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feeds his urge for violent action, attempting to save a preadolescent prostitute in the process.

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.actors: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson
movies.plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

movies.title: Planet 51
movies.director: Jorge Blanco, Javier Abad, Marcos Martínez
movies.actors: Jessica Biel, John Cleese, Gary Oldman, Dwayne Johnson
movies.plot: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.

movies.title: Looper
movies.actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Bruce Willis, Emily Blunt, Paul Dano
movies.plot: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.

movies.title: Corpse Bride
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Emily Watson, Tracey Ullman
movies.plot: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

movies.title: The Third Man
movies.actors: Joseph Cotten, Alida Valli, Orson Welles, Trevor Howard
movies.plot: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

movies.title: The Beach
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Daniel York, Patcharawan Patarakijjanon, Virginie Ledoyen
movies.plot: Twenty-something Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss - excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.

movies.title: Scarface
movies.actors: Al Pacino, Steven Bauer, Michelle Pfeiffer, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
movies.plot: In Miami in 1980, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

movies.title: Sid and Nancy
movies.actors: Gary Oldman, Chloe Webb, David Hayman, Debby Bishop
movies.plot: Morbid biographical story of Sid Vicious, bassist with British punk group the Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen. When the Sex Pistols break up after their fateful US tour, ...

movies.title: Black Swan
movies.actors: Natalie Portman, Mila Kunis, Vincent Cassel, Barbara Hershey
movies.plot: A committed dancer wins the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake" only to find herself struggling to maintain her sanity.

movies.title: Inception
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
movies.plot: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.title: The Deer Hunter
movies.actors: Robert De Niro, John Cazale, John Savage, Christopher Walken
movies.plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

movies.title: Chasing Amy
movies.actors: Ethan Suplee, Ben Affleck, Scott Mosier, Jason Lee
movies.plot: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's gay.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.actors: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington
movies.plot: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.actors: Jodie Foster, Lawrence A. Bonney, Kasi Lemmons, Lawrence T. Wrentz
movies.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

movies.title: Snatch
movies.actors: Benicio Del Toro, Dennis Farina, Vinnie Jones, Brad Pitt
movies.plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

movies.title: Midnight Express
movies.actors: Brad Davis, Irene Miracle, Bo Hopkins, Paolo Bonacelli
movies.plot: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.actors: Tim Roth, Amanda Plummer, Laura Lovelace, John Travolta
movies.plot: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
movies.actors: Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran, Jason Statham
movies.plot: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

movies.title: Lucky Number Slevin
movies.actors: Josh Hartnett, Bruce Willis, Lucy Liu, Morgan Freeman
movies.plot: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss. Slevin is under constant surveillance by relentless Detective Brikowski as well as the infamous assassin Goodkat and finds himself having to hatch his own ingenious plot to get them before they get him.

movies.title: Rear Window
movies.actors: James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey, Thelma Ritter
movies.plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

movies.title: Pan's Labyrinth
movies.actors: Ivana Baquero, Sergi López, Maribel Verdú, Doug Jones
movies.plot: In the falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Mark Ruffalo, Ben Kingsley, Max von Sydow
movies.plot: In 1954, a U.S. marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

movies.title: Reservoir Dogs
movies.actors: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen, Chris Penn
movies.plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.actors: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd, Scatman Crothers
movies.plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

movies.title: Midnight in Paris
movies.actors: Owen Wilson, Rachel McAdams, Kurt Fuller, Mimi Kennedy
movies.plot: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s everyday at midnight.

movies.title: Les Misérables
movies.actors: Hugh Jackman, Russell Crowe, Anne Hathaway, Amanda Seyfried
movies.plot: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

movies.title: L.A. Confidential
movies.actors: Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce, James Cromwell
movies.plot: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

movies.title: Moneyball
movies.actors: Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Robin Wright
movies.plot: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

movies.title: The Hangover
movies.actors: Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Justin Bartha
movies.plot: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

movies.title: The Great Beauty
movies.actors: Toni Servillo, Carlo Verdone, Sabrina Ferilli, Carlo Buccirosso
movies.plot: Jep Gambardella has seduced his way through the lavish nightlife of Rome for decades, but after his 65th birthday and a shock from the past, Jep looks past the nightclubs and parties to find a timeless landscape of absurd, exquisite beauty.

movies.title: Gran Torino
movies.actors: Clint Eastwood, Christopher Carley, Bee Vang, Ahney Her
movies.plot: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

movies.title: Mary and Max
movies.actors: Toni Collette, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Barry Humphries, Eric Bana
movies.plot: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

movies.title: Flight
movies.actors: Nadine Velazquez, Denzel Washington, Carter Cabassa, Adam C. Edwards
movies.plot: An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.

movies.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
movies.actors: Michael Berryman, Peter Brocco, Dean R. Brooks, Alonzo Brown
movies.plot: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

movies.title: Requiem for a Dream
movies.actors: Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly, Marlon Wayans
movies.plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

movies.title: The Truman Show
movies.actors: Jim Carrey, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich, Natascha McElhone
movies.plot: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a television show.

movies.title: The Artist
movies.actors: Jean Dujardin, Bérénice Bejo, John Goodman, James Cromwell
movies.plot: A silent movie star meets a young dancer, but the arrival of talking pictures sends their careers in opposite directions.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.actors: Tom Hanks, Rebecca Williams, Sally Field, Michael Conner Humphreys
movies.plot: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.

movies.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
movies.actors: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Ken Stott
movies.plot: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.

movies.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
movies.actors: Rebecca Hall, Scarlett Johansson, Christopher Evan Welch, Chris Messina
movies.plot: Two girlfriends on a summer holiday in Spain become enamored with the same painter, unaware that his ex-wife, with whom he has a tempestuous relationship, is about to re-enter the picture.

movies.title: Slumdog Millionaire
movies.actors: Dev Patel, Saurabh Shukla, Anil Kapoor, Rajendranath Zutshi
movies.plot: A Mumbai teen reflects on his upbringing in the slums when he is accused of cheating on the Indian Version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?"

movies.title: Lost in Translation
movies.actors: Scarlett Johansson, Bill Murray, Akiko Takeshita, Kazuyoshi Minamimagoe
movies.plot: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

movies.title: Match Point
movies.actors: Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Alexander Armstrong, Paul Kaye, Matthew Goode
movies.plot: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

movies.title: Psycho
movies.actors: Anthony Perkins, Vera Miles, John Gavin, Janet Leigh
movies.plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

movies.title: North by Northwest
movies.actors: Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason, Jessie Royce Landis
movies.plot: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

movies.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
movies.actors: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith
movies.plot: The animals try to fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African wildlife refuge, where Alex is reunited with his parents.

movies.title: Despicable Me 2
movies.actors: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Benjamin Bratt, Miranda Cosgrove
movies.plot: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.

movies.title: Downfall
movies.actors: Bruno Ganz, Alexandra Maria Lara, Corinna Harfouch, Ulrich Matthes
movies.plot: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

movies.title: Madagascar
movies.actors: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith
movies.plot: Spoiled by their upbringing with no idea what wild life is really like, four animals from New York Central Zoo escape, unwittingly assisted by four absconding penguins, and find themselves in Madagascar, among a bunch of merry lemurs

movies.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
movies.director: Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath, Conrad Vernon
movies.actors: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith
movies.plot: Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman are still fighting to get home to their beloved Big Apple. Their journey takes them through Europe where they find the perfect cover: a traveling circus, which they reinvent - Madagascar style.

movies.title: God Bless America
movies.actors: Joel Murray, Tara Lynne Barr, Melinda Page Hamilton, Mackenzie Brooke Smith
movies.plot: On a mission to rid society of its most repellent citizens, terminally ill Frank makes an unlikely accomplice in 16-year-old Roxy.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Rooney Mara, Bryan Barter, Dustin Fitzsimons
movies.plot: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

movies.title: The Pianist
movies.actors: Adrien Brody, Emilia Fox, Michal Zebrowski, Ed Stoppard
movies.plot: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

movies.title: Casablanca
movies.actors: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains
movies.plot: In Casablanca, Morocco in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

movies.title: American Gangster
movies.actors: Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Josh Brolin
movies.plot: In 1970s America, a detective works to bring down the drug empire of Frank Lucas, a heroin kingpin from Manhattan, who is smuggling the drug into the country from the Far East.

movies.title: Catch Me If You Can
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken, Martin Sheen
movies.plot: The true story of Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully conned millions of dollars' worth of checks as a Pan Am pilot, doctor, and legal prosecutor.

movies.title: American History X
movies.actors: Edward Norton, Edward Furlong, Beverly D'Angelo, Jennifer Lien
movies.plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

movies.title: Casino
movies.actors: Robert De Niro, Sharon Stone, Joe Pesci, James Woods
movies.plot: Greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends, a mafia underboss and a casino owner, for a trophy wife over a gambling empire.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley
movies.plot: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Penélope Cruz, Geoffrey Rush, Ian McShane
movies.plot: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.

movies.title: Crash
movies.actors: Karina Arroyave, Dato Bakhtadze, Sandra Bullock, Don Cheadle
movies.plot: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley
movies.plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.actors: Noel Appleby, Ali Astin, Sean Astin, David Aston
movies.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Oldboy
movies.actors: Min-sik Choi, Ji-tae Yu, Hye-jeong Kang, Dae-han Ji
movies.plot: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

movies.title: Chocolat
movies.actors: Alfred Molina, Carrie-Anne Moss, Aurelien Parent Koenig, Antonio Gil
movies.plot: A woman and her daughter open a chocolate shop in a small French village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.

movies.title: Casino Royale
movies.actors: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Mads Mikkelsen, Judi Dench
movies.plot: Armed with a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007 and must defeat a weapons dealer in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, but things are not what they seem.

movies.title: WALL·E
movies.actors: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard
movies.plot: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie, Matthew McConaughey
movies.plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

movies.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
movies.actors: Ron Perlman, Selma Blair, Doug Jones, John Alexander
movies.plot: The mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, so Hellboy and his team must save the world from the rebellious creatures.

movies.title: Sunset Boulevard
movies.actors: William Holden, Gloria Swanson, Erich von Stroheim, Nancy Olson
movies.plot: A hack screenwriter writes a screenplay for a former silent-film star who has faded into Hollywood obscurity.

movies.title: I-See-You.Com
movies.actors: Beau Bridges, Rosanna Arquette, Mathew Botuchis, Shiri Appleby
movies.plot: A 17-year-old boy buys mini-cameras and displays the footage online at I-see-you.com. The cash rolls in as the site becomes a major hit. Everyone seems to have fun until it all comes crashing down....

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.actors: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric, Adrien Brody
movies.plot: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

movies.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
movies.actors: Bill Bailey, Anna Chancellor, Warwick Davis, Yasiin Bey
movies.plot: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in America
movies.actors: Robert De Niro, James Woods, Elizabeth McGovern, Joe Pesci
movies.plot: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

movies.title: Oblivion
movies.actors: Tom Cruise, Morgan Freeman, Olga Kurylenko, Andrea Riseborough
movies.plot: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

movies.title: V for Vendetta
movies.actors: Natalie Portman, Hugo Weaving, Stephen Rea, Stephen Fry
movies.plot: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

movies.title: Gattaca
movies.actors: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Gore Vidal, Xander Berkeley
movies.plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

movies.title: Silver Linings Playbook
movies.actors: Bradley Cooper, Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro, Jacki Weaver
movies.plot: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

movies.title: Alice in Wonderland
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Mia Wasikowska, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne Hathaway
movies.plot: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

movies.title: Gandhi
movies.actors: Ben Kingsley, Candice Bergen, Edward Fox, John Gielgud
movies.plot: Gandhi's character is fully explained as a man of nonviolence. Through his patience, he is able to drive the British out of the subcontinent. And the stubborn nature of Jinnah and his commitment towards Pakistan is portrayed.

movies.title: Pacific Rim
movies.actors: Charlie Hunnam, Diego Klattenhoff, Idris Elba, Rinko Kikuchi
movies.plot: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

movies.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
movies.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Val Kilmer, Michelle Monaghan, Corbin Bernsen
movies.plot: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.

movies.title: The Quiet American
movies.actors: Michael Caine, Brendan Fraser, Do Thi Hai Yen, Rade Serbedzija
movies.plot: An older British reporter vies with a young U.S. doctor for the affections of a beautiful Vietnamese woman.

movies.title: Cloud Atlas
movies.director: Tom Tykwer, Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
movies.actors: Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, Jim Broadbent, Hugo Weaving
movies.plot: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

movies.title: The Impossible
movies.actors: Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor, Tom Holland, Samuel Joslin
movies.plot: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

movies.title: All Quiet on the Western Front
movies.actors: Louis Wolheim, Lew Ayres, John Wray, Arnold Lucy
movies.plot: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

movies.title: The English Patient
movies.actors: Ralph Fiennes, Juliette Binoche, Willem Dafoe, Kristin Scott Thomas
movies.plot: At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

movies.title: Dallas Buyers Club
movies.actors: Matthew McConaughey, Jennifer Garner, Jared Leto, Denis O'Hare
movies.plot: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

movies.title: Frida
movies.actors: Salma Hayek, Mía Maestro, Alfred Molina, Antonio Banderas
movies.plot: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.

movies.title: Before Sunrise
movies.actors: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Andrea Eckert, Hanno Pöschl
movies.plot: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

movies.title: The Rum Diary
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Rispoli, Amber Heard
movies.plot: American journalist Paul Kemp takes on a freelance job in Puerto Rico for a local newspaper during the 1960s and struggles to find a balance between island culture and the expatriates who live there.

movies.title: The Last Samurai
movies.actors: Ken Watanabe, Tom Cruise, William Atherton, Chad Lindberg
movies.plot: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

movies.title: Chinatown
movies.actors: Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston, Perry Lopez
movies.plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption and murder.
